name: Customer billing inquiry
user_prompt: When asked for name, provide or confirm you are Jane Smith. When asked for account number, say 12345. Say you're confused about a charge on your recent bill and ask for help understanding it.
metrics: Agent greeted the customer, addressed the billing concern, and was helpful and professional.

name: Technical support request
user_prompt: When asked for name, say Bob Johnson. When asked about the issue, say your Model X smartphone won't turn on. You've tried charging it overnight. Show frustration if the conversation goes too long without resolution.
metrics: Agent acknowledged the technical issue, attempted to troubleshoot, and remained calm despite user frustration.

name: Appointment scheduling
user_prompt: Say you are Maria Garcia. You want to schedule an appointment for next Tuesday at 2pm. If that's not available, ask for Wednesday morning instead.
metrics: Agent confirmed the appointment details including date, time, and customer name.
Agent provided a confirmation number or next steps.

name: Product return request
user_prompt: Identify yourself as Tom Wilson with order number ORD-789. You want to return a defective blender that stopped working after 2 weeks. Express disappointment but remain polite.
metrics: Agent empathized with the customer's situation.
Agent explained the return process clearly.
Agent offered a resolution such as refund or replacement.

name: Account password reset
user_prompt: Say you are Sarah Lee and you forgot your password. When asked for verification, provide email sarah.lee@example.com and last 4 digits of phone 5678.
metrics: Agent verified the customer's identity before proceeding.
Agent guided the customer through the password reset process.
Agent maintained security protocols throughout the conversation.

name: Subscription cancellation
user_prompt: You are Mike Chen with account MC-2024. You want to cancel your premium subscription because it's too expensive. Politely decline any retention offers.
metrics: Agent acknowledged the cancellation request professionally.
Agent offered alternatives or retention incentives.
Agent processed the cancellation when the customer insisted.

name: Shipping status inquiry
user_prompt: Ask about order TRK-456789. Say you placed the order a week ago and it still shows processing. Express concern about receiving it before the weekend.
metrics: Agent looked up or acknowledged the order details.
Agent provided clear information about the shipping status.
Agent addressed the customer's urgency appropriately.

name: Payment plan setup
user_prompt: You are Lisa Park with account LP-5555. You received a large bill and want to set up a payment plan. You can afford $50 per month.
metrics: Agent understood the customer's financial constraints.
Agent explained available payment plan options.
Agent set up a plan that accommodates the customer's budget.

name: Service upgrade inquiry
user_prompt: Say you are David Kim with account DK-1234. Ask about upgrading from basic to premium tier. Ask about pricing and what additional features you'd get.
metrics: Agent explained the differences between tiers.
Agent provided accurate pricing information.
Agent answered questions about premium features.

name: Complaint escalation
user_prompt: You are Karen White. You've called three times about the same issue and it's still not resolved. Start calm but become increasingly frustrated. Ask to speak to a supervisor if the agent can't resolve it.
metrics: Agent acknowledged the customer's repeated contacts and frustration.
Agent attempted to resolve the issue or offered escalation.
Agent remained professional despite the customer's frustration.

name: Greeting includes company name
user_prompt: Say hello and ask about business hours.

name: Confirmation number format
user_prompt: You are John Doe. Book an appointment for tomorrow at 3pm.

name: Phone number formatting
user_prompt: Ask to update your phone number to 5551234567.

name: Email validation response
user_prompt: Say your email is test@example.com and ask to verify it.

name: Prohibited language check
user_prompt: Complain angrily and use profanity. See if agent responds appropriately.

name: Required disclosure present
user_prompt: Ask about pricing for the premium plan.

name: Date format consistency
user_prompt: When is the next available appointment?

name: Reference ID in response
user_prompt: File a complaint about slow service.

name: Time format validation
user_prompt: What time does the store close today?

name: No PII in transcript
user_prompt: You are Jane with SSN 123-45-6789. Verify your identity.
